question: I have diabetes and have for many years (Type 2) and am on meds for high blood pressure as well. My doctor just gave me the results from my labs which was 328 and then went back to the labs before that and they were around 400 so there was an improvement. What does all this mean? I'm new at this and need all the help I can get. Am getting an appt. with a kidney specialist soon.
title: What stage is 328-400? My doctor just gave me these readings. What does it mean?
